    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper connect(java.lang.String host,
                                     int sessionTimeoutMS,
                                     int connectionTimeoutMS)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                              com.konakart.app.KKException
        Connect to the Zookeeper or Zookeeper ensemble. Returns a ZooKeeper object if successful.
        Parameters:
        host - Zookeeper hosts string (IP addresses of the single Zookeeper or all of the Zookeepers in the ensemble)
        sessionTimeoutMS - session timeout in milliseconds
        connectionTimeoutMS - timeout in milliseconds to connect to Zookeeper ensemble
        Returns:
        a ZooKeeper object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        com.konakart.app.KKException - thrown if there is a connection timeout

      • getSolrIPs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSolrIPs()
                                            throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get a List of the live Solr IP addresses each in the form (host:port). The live Solr IP addresses are retrieved from the live_nodes node.
        Returns:
        a List of Strings representing the live Solr addresses
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException

      • getSolrURLs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSolrURLs()
                                             throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get a List of the live Solr http URLs each in the form (http://host:port/). The live Solr IP addresses are retrieved from the live_nodes node.
        Returns:
        a List of Strings representing the live Solr URLs
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException

      • getSolrIP

        public java.lang.String getSolrIP()
                           throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get a live Solr IP address (host:port). The live Solr IP addresses are retrieved from the live_nodes node and one of these is chosen at random to return.
        Returns:
        a String representing the selected live Solr IP address
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException

        public java.lang.String getStatusString()

        Returns:
        a String representing the status of the KKZookeeperConnect
